title: WHO urges continued mask-wearing, even for vaccinated individuals, as delta variant spreads
content:
1. WHO urges continued mask-wearing, even for vaccinated individuals, as delta variant spreads  WGN TV Chicago
  2. 'Please get your second shot,' top health official urges as Delta variant remains a pressing threat  CNN
  3. United Kingdom: Over 35204 Delta variant cases detected in a week | Latest World English News |WION  WION
  4. No evidence on seriousness of Covid-19 caused by Delta Plus variant yet, says Shahid Jameel  Deccan Herald
  5. Delta COVID-19 variant detected in Ottawa County  WOOD TV8
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
WHO urges continued mask-wearing, even for vaccinated individuals, as delta variant spreads  WGN TV Chicago
'Please get your second shot,' top health official urges as Delta variant remains a pressing threat  CNN 
United Kingdom: Over 35204 Delta variant cases detected in a week | Latest World English News |WION  WION
No evidence on seriousness of Covid-19 caused by Delta Plus variant yet, says Shahid Jameel  Deccan Herald
Delta COVID-19 variant detected in Ottawa County  WOOD TV8

localize.title: 世界保健機関（WHO）、デルタ・バリアントの拡大に伴い、ワクチン接種者であってもマスク着用の継続を要請
世卫组织敦促继续戴口罩，即使是接种过疫苗的人也要戴口罩，因为德尔塔变体正在蔓延。
世衛組織敦促繼續戴口罩，即使是接種過疫苗的人也要戴口罩，因爲德爾塔變體正在蔓延。
